page.title: 03MUGIEMOSS MILL
page.content: Mugiemoss Mills is owned by Davidson, Radcliffe Ltd., which is owned by B.P.B Industries Ltd. John Davidson founded Mugiemoss Mills in Bucksburn in 1770. Davidsons was first known as The British Plasterboard Company which formed as a private company in 1917. Throughout its history Davidsons has been very successful. They employ 545 shift workers and additional members of staff. The factory building is 158 metres long x 19 metres wide x 15 metres high which cost Â£2.1 million. Their wide range of products include unlined chipboard and Kraft lined chipboard. These are available in thicknesses of 350-1000 microns. A number of more specialized products has been developed.
